p: F81 cells were seeded in 96-well plates (2.5 × 10 4 cells/well) and pretreated with 4 μL Nitazoxanide, Closantel Sodium, and Closantel with final concentrations of 10 μM, then infected with CPV (MOI = 0.076). Cells were incubated for 4 h, 8 h, 12 h and 24 h at 37 °C and 5% CO 2. The assay was performed in triplicates. Caspase-Glo 3/7 assay kit (Promega, USA) was used to detect pro- or antiapoptotic effects of the identified drugs [ 14, 23]. The luminescence of each sample was measured using a SYNERGY H1 microplate reader (BioTek Instruments Inc., Winooski, USA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions [ 14].
